{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3143926,"name":"Nathan Shepherd","username":"NShep98","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nshep98/{size}/224800_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-11T23:21:11.353Z","cooked":"

I plugged a Blinkin LED Driver into a robot battery with a 5V LED strip attached and absolutely nothing happened. The likely answer is probably that it’s dead, but I figured it can’t hurt to see if it’s salvageable. The last time I can remember it being used was the 2018 offseason.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2023-02-11T23:21:11.353Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":9,"reads":111,"readers_count":110,"score":67.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":426525,"topic_slug":"blinkin-led-driver-unresponsive","display_username":"Nathan Shepherd","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":25762,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2079 A -> 246 M -> 1153/1119 M"},"post_url":"/t/blinkin-led-driver-unresponsive/426525/1","custom_user_title":"2079 A -> 246 M -> 1153/1119 M","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3143940,"name":"Mike Taylor (he/him)","username":"Taylor","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/taylor/{size}/232955_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-12T00:10:01.157Z","cooked":"

Ours only works when it’s plugged into 12V, and then only when the battery is fully charged.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2023-02-12T00:10:01.157Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":102,"readers_count":101,"score":25.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":426525,"topic_slug":"blinkin-led-driver-unresponsive","display_username":"Mike Taylor (he/him)","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":5678,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3487 Red Pride Robotics"},"post_url":"/t/blinkin-led-driver-unresponsive/426525/2","custom_user_title":"3487 Red Pride Robotics","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3143951,"name":"Christopher149","username":"Christopher149","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/838e76/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-02-12T00:48:02.017Z","cooked":"

Based on some things we ran into:

  • on the 5V strip are the arrows pointing away from the Blinkin?
  • is the Blinkin set to run the 5V lights as opposed to 12V?
  • is the Blinkin default color set to something other than “black” (i.e. off)?
","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2023-02-12T00:48:02.017Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":85,"readers_count":84,"score":22.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":426525,"topic_slug":"blinkin-led-driver-unresponsive","display_username":"Christopher149","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":5678,"username":"Taylor","name":"Mike Taylor (he/him)","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/taylor/{size}/232955_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":14984,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC857 lead mentor / FTC10723+13284+15270 lead mentor"},"post_url":"/t/blinkin-led-driver-unresponsive/426525/3","custom_user_title":"FRC857 lead mentor / FTC10723+13284+15270 lead mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3143972,"name":"Nathan Shepherd","username":"NShep98","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nshep98/{size}/224800_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-12T01:28:25.409Z","cooked":"

  • on the 5V strip are the arrows pointing away from the Blinkin?
    Yes

  • is the Blinkin set to run the 5V lights as opposed to 12V?
    None of the status lights responded, so indeterminate

  • is the Blinkin default color set to something other than “black” (i.e. off)?
    I tweaked the color knobs around, so I would assume no

Nothing lights up?

Does anything change if you pop it into a PDH?
